tooltip.hotbarreborn.globalenabled: Whether any of the mods features work
tooltip.hotbarreborn.xoffhot: Modifies the X-Value of the hotbar
tooltip.hotbarreborn.ysubhot: Subtracts from the Y-Value (makes it go up)
tooltip.hotbarreborn.showHotBack: Whether to show the background of the hotbar
tooltip.hotbarreborn.showHotSel: Whether to show the selected item indicator
tooltip.hotbarreborn.animSel: Whether to animate the selected item indicator's movement
